# noyau.news
> Daily engineering digest. 10 things worth knowing, delivered every morning.

NoyauAI aggregates content from RSS feeds, GitHub releases, X/Twitter, Reddit, dev.to, and YouTube. Stories are clustered by topic, scored algorithmically, and distilled into actionable summaries.

## Content

- Daily issues at /daily/YYYY-MM-DD with 10 ranked stories
- Each story: headline, teaser, takeaway, bullet points, source citations
- Items 1-5 publicly accessible; items 6-10 require subscription
- New issues published daily at 08:00 UTC

## Topics

- Cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCP, Azure)
- Open source releases and changelogs
- Security advisories and CVEs
- Developer tooling and productivity
- Machine learning and AI
- Site reliability and observability

## API

- GET /api/issues/latest - most recent issue
- GET /api/issues/{YYYY-MM-DD} - issue by date
- GET /api/issues/dates - list of all published dates

## Feeds

- RSS: /feed.xml
- Sitemap: /sitemap.xml
- Extended context: /llms-full.txt

## Crawling

Please respect rate limits: 1 request per second.
